quotes.message: The creation of a new heart, the renewing of a right spirit is an omnipotent work of God. Leave it to the Creator. He which hath begun a good work in you will perfect it unto that day.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: Rebirth is neither born of blood nor flesh or human origin. But born of God.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Reincarnation is not what a lot of people think. Yes, we are eternal. No, everyone does not attain enlightenment; it's not necessary; life is smarter than we are.
quotes.name: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.message: You will be reborn. You will come from the inner to the outer again. This process goes on indefinitely.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Reincarnation is simply changing awareness. What you are reincarnating into are different states of mind. The whole show is on the inside.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Reincarnation is not something that occurs at death; it is something that takes place at every moment. Death and rebirth are occurring every second.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: There can be no rebirth without a dark night of the soul, a total annihilation of all that you believed in and thought that you were.
quotes.name: Vilayat Inayat Khan

quotes.message: Death is the begining, the birth of births, a rebirth, a second chance to fix all mistakes, Death is the begining.
quotes.name: Marc Lampe

quotes.message: You were born a child of light's wonderful secret- you return to the beauty you have always been.
quotes.name: Aberjhani

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: Rebirth is inevitable so long as one has desires. It is like taking the soul from one pillow-case and putting it into another. Only one or two out of many men can be found who are free from all desires.
quotes.name: Sarada Devi

quotes.message: The birth and rebirth of all nature, The passing of winter and spring, We share with the life universal, Rejoice in the magical ring.
quotes.name: Doreen Valiente

quotes.message: Reincarnation is a process in which a finite being will go through a series of transmutations and will perceive different things. There will be a continuity of perception.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: There was a charm in being reborn into the world when one was old enough to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.message: Reincarnation contains a most comforting explanation of reality by means of which Indian thought surmounts difficulties which baffle the thinkers of Europe.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: A rebirth out of spiritual adversity causes us to become new creatures.
quotes.name: James E Faust

quotes.message: We are born and reborn again and again. We are changing with the waves of time.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha
